conditions.name: Asthma
conditions.suggestion: Use prescribed inhalers. Common tablets: Montelukast (10mg) daily for prevention, Prednisone (5-60mg) for severe attacks. Quick-relief inhalers: Albuterol. Avoid triggers, follow asthma action plan, seek emergency care for severe attacks.

conditions.name: Chronic Bronchitis
conditions.suggestion: Common tablets: Theophylline (100-200mg) for bronchodilation, Roflumilast (500mcg) to reduce inflammation, Guaifenesin (400mg) for mucus. Quit smoking, use bronchodilator inhalers, pulmonary rehabilitation, avoid irritants.

conditions.name: Pneumonia
conditions.suggestion: Common tablets: Amoxicillin (500mg) or Azithromycin (500mg) for bacterial pneumonia, Acetaminophen (500mg) for fever/pain, Guaifenesin (600mg) for mucus. Rest, stay hydrated, use humidifier, practice breathing exercises.
